scripts.build: npm run clean && pulp --then "npm run wrapMain" build --skip-entry-point --optimise --to output/screepsMain.js
scripts.wrapMain: cp output/screepsMain.js output/main.js && echo 'module.exports.loop = PS["Main"].main' >> output/main.js
scripts.watch:deploy: pulp --watch --then "npm run wrapMain && npm run deploy" build --skip-entry-point --optimise --to output/screepsMain.js
scripts.watch:deploy:sim: pulp --watch --then "npm run wrapMain && npm run deploy:sim" build --skip-entry-point --optimise --to output/screepsMain.js
scripts.watch:deploy:private: pulp --watch --then "npm run wrapMain && npm run deploy:private" build --skip-entry-point --optimise --to output/screepsMain.js
